response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also provides you with an opportunity to maximize your investment at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
